name: The Mind Fiends and Me
description:
The Mind Fiends and Me (demo) is a point and click game where you will explore the post apocalyptic and almost surreal word of the Mind Fiends.

What's a mind fiend? Where are you and Who are you?
Answer all of these questions by clicking around and engage in riddles and puzzles.

This game is made to showcase a specific art-style, with point and click adventure game development in mind. 

For more games and further info:
www.alexanderhultberg.net
